name: These Three Things
description:
It's been foretold that the Grand Bazaar holds many a secret recipe, can you make your way through the market to collect the coveted secret ingredient?

Grandma always said, "you don't need a pantry to bake a cake, just three key ingredients!"

Controls

  • A and D to walk
  • Space to Jump
  • Tab to flip through the owned recipes
  • E to make and eat a recipe

Known Issues

  • The game lag sometimes. Try refreshing the browser
  • The NPCs float sometimes. They're not supposed to float. It is what it is
